description: Thinking of making a day jaunt across the Causeway? STÂ brings you a tried-and-tested guide. Read more at straitstimes.com.
title: Johor Bahru day trip guide: New dog cafe, art gallery, karaoke joint and more
title_page: Johor Bahru day trip guide: New dog cafe, art gallery, karaoke joint and more | The Straits Times
maintext:
JOHOR BAHRU - I spot the Singaporeans a mile away.
The man in the Air Force T-shirt drinking a beer at a hawker centre. The group of friends cafe-hopping on a Sunday. The girl wearing her boyfriend's oversized army tee, schlepping home from a staycation, boxes of cake in hand.
